column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Opal says : " Mom !
#Text=" Opal says : " Kuvira caught Zhu Li and threw her in the town .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What ?
#Text=No , I have to go save her .
#Text=" Lin says : " You ca n't go in there , kid .
#Text=It 's suicide .
#Text=Kuvira 's onto us .
#Text=" Bolin says : " We 've been through too much together .
#Text=I ca n't leave her .
#Text=Toph , you said Zhu Li was lying about fixing the cannon .
#Text=She must have been trying to stop it .
#Text=" Toph says : " For all you know , she could just have been covering her butt because she made a mistake .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , Zhu Li does n't make mistakes .
#Text=You guys leave .
#Text=If we make it out , we 'll make it to the city somehow .
#Text=" Opal says : " Bolin , no !
#Text=You guys get out of here .
#Text=I have to go with Bolin .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Could be our best chance to stop Kuvira .
#Text=" Lin says : " Maybe take out that weapon .
#Text=" Wing says : " We ca n't let Opal be the coolest !
#Text=" Toph says : " If you all want to get yourselves captured again or worse , that 's your business .
#Text=I 'm through .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Watch out for Baatar Sr. and Huan .
#Text=" Baatar says : " So how have you been , mother ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I told you never to call me that .
#Text="
